00015 VhdlPort::VhdlPort( VhdlGenerator2* parent, Port* port ):
00016 VhdlObject(parent, port->getName(), 
00017                    port->getTypeName(),
00018                    port->getDefaultValue(), 
00019                    port->getDescription()),
00020 direction_(port->getDirection()),
00021 left_(port->getLeftBound()),
00022 right_(port->getRightBound()),
00023 commentOut_(true) {
00024 
00025         Q_ASSERT(parent);
00026         Q_ASSERT(port);
00027 
00028         // if type is not set then use the defaults
00029         if (type_.isEmpty()) {
00030 
00031                 int size = left_ - right_ + 1;
00032 
00033                 // if port is scalar
00034                 if (size == 1) {
00035                         type_ = QString("std_logic");
00036                 }
00037                 else {
00038                         type_ = QString("std_logic_vector");
00039                 }
00040         }
00041 }
00042

00074 void VhdlPort::write( QTextStream& stream ) const {
00075         if (commentOut_) {
00076                 stream << "-- ";
00077         }
00078         stream << name_ << " : " << General::direction2Str(direction_) << " ";
00079 
00080         stream << VhdlGeneral::vhdlType2String(type_, left_, right_);
00081 }
00082 
00083 int VhdlPort::size() const {
00084         return left_ - right_ + 1;
00085 }
00086 
00087 int VhdlPort::left() const {
00088         return left_;
00089 }
00090 
00091 int VhdlPort::right() const {
00092         return right_;
